definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Liu seven weeks flint go first, and confessed he must find out who is ghost.
sentences.chinese: 劉七讓周懦生先走，並交待他一定要查出內鬼是誰。

sentences.english: After interrogated them to transfer the complete delinquent account.
sentences.chinese: 經審問他們全都交待了全部犯罪事實。

sentences.english: Mainly transfers Huixian dialect ownership question and within the boundaries language nonuninformity.
sentences.chinese: 主要交待了輝縣方言的歸屬問題和境內語言的差異。

sentences.english: Mexican officials said the suspect had confessed to being a lookout for the gang.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥官員表示，嫌疑人交待，曾爲犯罪團伙放哨。

sentences.english: You must account for your absence to the manager.
sentences.chinese: 你必須向經理交待你缺席的原因。

sentences.english: You can submit a good account, O mind, to the King of Death.
sentences.chinese: 那麼就可以向死亡之王有好的交待。

sentences.english: Zhang confessed that and open collusion locksmith, made from burglary, theft 8.
sentences.chinese: 張某交待了和開鎖匠串通，製造的8起入室盜竊案。

sentences.english: Assist in tire over inspection and other temporary tasks.
sentences.chinese: 協助輪胎複檢及其他臨時交待任務。

sentences.english: Jack holds the man’s medicine to entice him into revealing more information.
sentences.chinese: 傑克控制着他的心臟病藥，誘使他交待更多的信息。

sentences.english: He told her to turn off the headlights and lock the doors until he returned.
sentences.chinese: 他交待她把車前燈關掉，鎖好車門等他回來。

sentences.english: But what is to be done about Pemberley?
sentences.chinese: 可是怎樣向彭伯裏交待呢？

sentences.english: The bulk of the property was, as before has been said, to go to the son .
sentences.chinese: 家產的大部分正如以前交待過的，將歸兒子所有。

sentences.english: Tang sugar to personally find superior ask account to home.
sentences.chinese: 唐糖要親自找超羣問清楚給家裏一個交待。

sentences.english: The thief made a trembling confession of his wrongdoings.
sentences.chinese: 那個竊賊顫抖着交待了自己乾的壞事。

sentences.english: From what she said, you must have been given an inaccurate picture of what was expected of you.
sentences.chinese: 依他所說，肯定是他們沒有把你要乾的事交待清楚。

definition: to hand over/to explain/to make clear/to brief (sb)/to account for/to justify oneself/to confess/(coll.) to finish
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to report back after completion of one's mission
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to show an interest in/to get involved with
to pass on a story/to communicate a message
